title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models from any Python script.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, retrieval, and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that clones ChatGPT look-and-feel; manage models, chat, share conversations, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & async APIs, streaming, embeddings, custom timeouts, model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple generate/chat methods, model pull/list/delete, streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with readline history, syntax highlighting, and conversation save/load.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as GitHub-Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat panel.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration; use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines with native streaming.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; strongly-typed async client, streaming, embeddings, model operations.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app using the Ollama JS client; showcases streaming completions and simple UI components.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop GUI for Ollama; browse, download, and chat with local models on Windows/macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama server plus web-ui in containers with GPU passthrough.

title: ollama-kotlin-sdk
summary: Community Kotlin multiplatform SDK for Ollama; coroutines, serialization, supports JVM/Android targets.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# .NET client for Ollama; async chat/generate, streaming, embeddings, model management in NuGet package.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU nodes, PVC storage, and service exposure.

title: ollama-rag
summary: End-to-end RAG template using Ollama embeddings + LlamaIndex; ingest PDFs, query with local LLM, Gradio UI.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands, threads, and moderation hooks.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and common models for reproducible deployments on NixOS or via nix-shell.
